name: com.unity.ide.linux
description: Unified IDE integration package for Linux systems supporting VS Code engine-based editors including VS Code Insiders, Cursor, and other compatible editors. Provides automatic discovery, project generation for IntelliSense, debugging support, and seamless Unity integration. This package complements the official Unity VS Code support with enhanced Linux-specific functionality.

_upm.changelog:
Integration:

- Monitor `additionalfile` extension by default.
- Try opening a Visual Studio Code workspace if there's one (`.code-workspace` file in the Unity project).

Project generation:

- Identify `asset`, `meta`, `prefab` and `unity` files as `yaml` (Visual Studio Code).
- Add `sln`/`csproj` file nesting (Visual Studio Code).
- Improve SDK style project generation.
